name: Mission Prisoner Transport
description:
Mission Prisoner Transport!!!
Be the ultimate prison bus driver who is keen to fulfill his duty at any cost and this off-road military truck driving to the completion of the assigned task without any accident or any kind of incident to the army base. Be the ultimate army trucker who drive & park the heavy truck to load up the enemies into the back of truck & then drive them to high security prison in the military convoy.
Features:
Challenging missions with extreme off0road environment.
Drive prisoners truck with extreme tuned driving physics.
Pick up the prisoners & drop them to the army base jail.
Real life law enforcer duty with lots of missions.
Smooth controls, steering & brakes.
Exciting gameplay with hd graphics.
